ai:cl.c: The MetaClass is used to manage all classes supported by the system core.

ai:m.c: Search a class definition for a specific field.
ai:m.p: ERR mc::FindField(OBJECTPTR Object, INT ID, struct Field ** Field, objMetaClass ** Source)

ai:i.c: The field ID to search for. Field names can be converted to ID's by using the strihash() function.
Pointer to the Field if discovered, otherwise NULL.
Pointer to the class that is associated with the Field (which can match the caller), or NULL if the field was not found.

ai:f.c: This field can be read to retrieve a MetaClass object's internal action table.
Defines the actions supported by the class.
Specifies the base class ID of a class object.
The system category that a class belongs to.
Specifies the ID of a class object.
The name of the represented class.
The version number of the class.
Returns a field lookup table sorted by field IDs.
Points to a FieldArray that describes the class' object structure.
Describes the file type represented by the class.
Describes the file extension represented by the class.
Defines a string expression that will allow relevant file data to be matched to the class.
Optional flag settings.
Associates an icon with the file data for this class.
Returns the path from which the class binary is loaded.
Set this field to define the methods supported by the class.
The name of the module binary that initialised the class.
Returns an allocated list of all objects that belong to this class.
The total number of active objects that are linked back to the MetaClass.
The path to the module binary that represents the class.
Returns a direct reference to the RootModule object that hosts the class.
The total size of the object structure represented by the MetaClass.
